course_description: This course begins with a substantial introduction to the practices and principles of Marshall Rosenberg's process of Nonviolent Communication (NVC). The development of empathy skills is central to NVC. This section will include an exploration of how NVC might fit into a life committed to social justice ministry and work. The course will then move to explore a sampling of pedagogical methods and the ways that they relate to empathy as a path of learning.)
